text: avarkaḷ (pōrukkup) puṟappaṭa nāṭiyiruntāl, ataṟku vēṇṭiya tayārippukaḷaic ceytiruppārkaḷ; eṉiṉum avarkaḷ puṟappaṭuvatai allāh veṟuttu, avarkaḷ puṟappaṭātavāṟu taṭai ceytuviṭṭāṉ; (pōril kalantu koḷḷa muṭiyāp peṇkaḷ, mutiyavarkaḷaippōl)"taṅkupavarkaḷuṭaṉ, nīṅkaḷum taṅkiviṭuṅkaḷ" eṉṟu (avarkaḷukku) kūṟappaṭṭatu
